ComicInfo.Summary:
SERIES FINALE
A 2018 Eisner Award nominee for Best New Series and Best Writer, JEFF LEMIRE! The critically acclaimed, multi-generational saga of the Pike family comes to its conclusion as the ghosts of the past catch up to them and point the Pike Family toward an unexpected future.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Jeff Lemire | 1 | | B | Cover B | Emi Lenox | Missing | | C | Cover C | Ray Fawkes | Missing |
